news.content:
Own your data

Is your data really yours? No. But it can be, with ThreeFold.

Learn more about why we do what we do: https://info.threefold.io/#/?id=why-we-do-what-we-do

next.title: ThreeFold at Barcelona Blockchain Week
next.excerpt: On 6th October at 1pm CEST our very own rocket scientist Weynand Kuijpers will be representing ThreeFold.
